column4: Can I burn a video CD from a .mov file in Linux that will play in a PS2?
you need "transcode" to convert the format: you can do it, but ISTR it's quite involved
my answer to that will be silence for decency's sake...google ubuntu transcode for starters
what format od I need and what do I have to do to burn a vcd?  cdrecord.mmap -dev=ATAPI:/dev/hdc -data foo.mpeg or something?
